name: The Angry Bee
description:
THE ANGRY BEE

This game was made in 3 hours for the Trijam 192.

In this game, you play as a bee, and you must get to the end of the hive while getting the obstacles out of your way!

How to play? Controls

W-A-S-D : Move.
Space : Shoot a dart.

Survive!

Navigate skillfully with W-A-S-D around the obstacles to avoid them! Reach the finish line to end the game! (The finish line will spawn after 30 seconds).

Get the best score!

Press space to shoot a dart! The dart can destroy the obstacles, but be careful! Each obstacle destroyed will spawn bullets!
Each destroyed obstacle increase your score by 1.

Hope you'll have fun playing my little game!
